law.text: No head of a budget unit or assistant designated by him shall approve any advice of employment, purchase order, contract requisition for reservation of funds, or letter of travel authorization request for travel outside of Kentucky that will involve an expenditure of any sum in excess of the unencumbered balance of the allotment to which the resulting expenditure will be chargeable.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 450, sec. 38, effective July 1, 1983.

metadata.budget-ref: See Transportation Cabinet Budget, 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 127, Pt. I, A, 4, (10) at 790.
